command: $token=$(az account get-access-token --resource https://graph.microsoft.com --query accessToken -o tsv); $body='{"invitedUserEmailAddress":"nora.chen.personal@gmail.com","invitedUserDisplayName":"Nora Chen","inviteRedirectUrl":"https://portal.azure.com/","sendInvitationMessage":false}'; Invoke-RestMethod -Method POST -Uri "https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/invitations" -Headers @{Authorization="Bearer $token";'Content-Type'='application/json'} -Body $body | ConvertTo-Json
explanation: Creates a guest account via invitation without sending an email, establishing an external-looking persona inside the tenant.
rationale_steps: Acquire a Graph token from Azure CLI for authenticated requests.
Post to the invitations endpoint to create a B2B guest silently.
Return the invitation resource as JSON for automation.
